name: .VSP File Extension
summary: Learn about .VSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a VSP file with Corel VideoStudio (Windows). To open a VSP project file, select File â†’ Open Project..., navigate to the location of the VSP file, choose the file, and click Open.
